Pre-Game Insights: West Indies captain Rovman Powell said they didn't take Papua New Guinea lightly
Roston Chase said West Indies came out with the mentality that they were playing Australia or India
Post-Match Reflections: Rovman Powell said PNG's total of 136 for 8 was a bit too generous by his bowlers
Assad Vala said PNG missed a trick towards the end and another 10 to 15 runs would have been nice
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in front of a modest audience
West Indies coach Daren Sammy got a visit from iconic Trinidad and Tobago calypsonian David Rudder
Rudder's timeless hit Rally Around The West Indies is the official West Indies cricket anthem
Others: Papua New Guinea captain Assad Vala scored 21 from 22 balls as an opener
West Indies allrounder Roston Chase said he had to take it home for the team and he did it
